DOC.brief_summary: The purpose phase 3b study compare safety efficacy everolimus low dose tacrolimus mycophenolate mofetil standard dose tacrolimus kidney transplant recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Study Safety Efficacy Everolimus With Low Dose Tacrolimus Mycophenolate Mofetil With Standard Dose Tacrolimus Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female renal recipient 1870 year age undergoing kidney transplantation , either primary retransplant ; Recipient cadaveric , decease donor ( include expand criterion donor organ decease donor organ cardiac death ) , live unrelated nonHLA identical living relate donor kidney ; Graft must functional ( produce great equal 100 ml urine within 24 hour transplantation ) time randomization . Exclusion criterion : Donor organ cold ischemic time > 30 hour ; Males females produce less 100 ml urine first 24 hour posttransplantation ; Males females recipient ABO incompatible transplant , T cell , B cell crossmatch positive transplant ; Males females severe total hypercholesterolemia total hypertriglyceridemia ( Patients lipid lower treatment control hyperlipidemia acceptable ) ; Males females surgical medical condition , severe diarrhea , active peptic ulcer disease , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , opinion investigator , might alter absorption , distribution , metabolism and/or excretion study medication . Other protocol relate inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
